t= int(raw_input())
lists = []
for te in range(t):
   input = raw_input()
   lists.append(input)
   count = 0
lists.sort()
for x in range(len(lists) - 1) :
   #print x
   #print lists[x]
   if lists[x] == lists [x + 1]:
      count = count + 1
   else:
      count = count + 1  
      print ( str(lists[x]) + " " + str(count))
      count = 0
   if x == len(lists) -2 :
      count = count + 1
      print ( str(lists[x+1]) + " " + str(count))
